title: Tech News: The Epic Apple vs Epic Fight Continues
itunes:title: Tech News: The Epic Apple vs Epic Fight Continues
description:
An appeals court is preparing to hear arguments from Epic, Apple, the State of California and even the US Department of Justice in the ongoing battle between developers and Apple. Hackers gained access to Uber's systems and we're not sure how bad it was yet. And Nvidia is announcing new GPUs today! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
An appeals court is preparing to hear arguments from Epic, Apple, the State of California and even the US Department of Justice in the ongoing battle between developers and Apple. Hackers gained access to Uber's systems and we're not sure how bad it was yet. And Nvidia is announcing new GPUs today! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Apple, Epic Games, Department of Justice, DoJ, anti-competitive, monopoly, Google, YouTube, recommendation engine, Nvidia, graphics cards, GPUs, China, space, Moon, helium-3, fusion, customs, data privacy, data security, constitution, search and seizure, Twitter, propaganda, sexual harassment, Tesla, Elon Musk, SpaceX, NASA, Artemis I
